name: Painting Masterclass
description: Explore the world of painting with our masterclass. Learn various techniques and create stunning artworks.

name: Pottery Workshop
description: Get your hands dirty and create beautiful pottery pieces. Join our workshop to experience the joy of pottery.

name: Crafting for Beginners
description: Discover the art of crafting from scratch. Our beginners' class will guide you through the process of creating unique crafts.

name: Sketching Fundamentals
description: Learn the fundamental skills of sketching. From basic lines to detailed drawings, our class covers it all.

name: Digital Art Workshop
description: Dive into the world of digital art. Our workshop will introduce you to digital drawing and illustration techniques.

name: Calligraphy Class
description: Master the art of beautiful writing with our calligraphy class. Express your thoughts through elegant lettering.

name: Sculpture and Modeling
description: Explore the art of sculpture and modeling. Create 3D artworks and express your creativity in a tangible form.

name: Handmade Jewelry
description: Design and craft your own handmade jewelry. Learn the art of metalwork and create personalized accessories.

name: Collage Art
description: Experiment with collage art. Combine various materials to create unique and expressive visual compositions.

name: Origami Workshop
description: Master the art of origami. Fold paper into intricate shapes and create beautiful paper sculptures.
